MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:17am. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation.And our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30am. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8AM on Monday, 11 January 2021.
